subject: Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: In the wake of Lance Armstrong’s admission that he used performance-enhancing drugs, Nike announced that it will stop manufacturing Livestrong-brand shoes and apparel at the end of this year.
snippet: In the wake of Lance Armstrong’s admission that he used performance-enhancing drugs, Nike announced that it will stop manufacturing Livestrong-brand shoes and apparel at the end of this year.
